taskBoard

Class ExecuteOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskBoard.ExecuteOperation

  • public class ExecuteOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class executes the operation based on user input if it is valid, such as create, move, update and complete functions

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExecuteOperation()
      Constructor that creates new instance of DocumentBuilderFactory, DocumentBuilder and Document

        public org.w3c.dom.Node createNode(java.lang.String storyId,
                                   java.lang.String taskId,
                                   java.lang.String description,
                                   java.lang.String taskStatus)
        Create a new task node under parent element "Story" or create a new story node under root element "StoriesAndTasks", with "taskDescription" and "taskStatus" tags
        Parameters:
        storyId - The story id associated with a new task id
        taskId - The new task id
        description - The new task description associated with the new task id
        taskStatus - The initial status of the new task
        Returns:
        The new created task node or story node
